overview:
Alex Yost is an entrepreneurial project manager at andCulture - an integrated marketing and technology experience design firm based in Harrisburg PA.

Alex Yost is an entrepreneurial project manager at ProspectMX - a Lancaster PA based internet marketing firm.

Prior to andCulture, Yost was SEO Project Manager at ProspectMX and Managing Director and Operations Manager at FranklinCovey in Turkey - the global leader in training and consulting in the areas of strategy execution, leadership, and individual effectiveness.

Yost has 10 plus years of business management experience as well as early stage or startup experience in four additional companies. Professional interests include management in uncertain and cross-cultural environments, project management, entrepreneurship, strategic planning, financial management, and organizational leadership.
